articles.description: In this exclusive chat with Hindustan Times, Sonakshi Sinha shares her experience about playing the vengeful Fareedan in Heeramandi. | Bollywood
articles.content: Sonakshi Sinha is ready to take on strong female protagonists and surprise her audience with each new role. The actor plays Fareedan in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's Heeramandi - The Diamond Bazaar. It mar… [+8107 chars]
